data.title: Canada Student Loan Repayment Relief: As of November 1, no single Canadian will have to repay their Canada Student Loan until she or he is earning at least $25,000 per year
Pirate Party triples seats in Icelandic parliament
India planning to offer $3.1 billion Support for Solar Power Related Industries and Manufactirers
Russia sending three submarines towards Syria in preparation for major assault on Aleppo
With two new executive orders, the Turkish government has inflicted a fatal blow to mostly Kurdish media, shutting down 15 media outlets

Bolivia, which holds 20 percent of the world's tropical glaciers has seen its glaciers shrunk by 43% since the mid-1980s. The melting has left behind at least 25 unstable glacial lakes capable of causing sudden and catastrophic outburst floods.
Asylum seekers face lifetime ban on entering Australia if they arrive by boat
Polish-born historian may face charges in Poland for writing that Poles killed Jews in World War II
EU and Canada sign long-delayed free trade deal
